snippet: Researchers examining trials of cancer treatments found that the more effective a treatment was said to be, the more likely the bad side effects were minimized.
abstract: Researchers examining trials of cancer treatments found that the more effective a treatment was said to be, the more likely the bad side effects were minimized.

headline.main: Clinical Trials Flawed by Biased Reporting
headline.print_headline: Risks: Clinical Trials Flawed by Biased Reporting
